Author: nuriatonantzin
Text: You can’t control what people do or think of you, it doesn’t matter how hard you try. Maybe you can start by being kind and loving towards yourself, that might make other people treat you better, but don’t do it because of other people, do it for you! No matter what you do or have done, you ALWAYS deserve to eat. Sending hugs your way, also, don’t let it become a bigger problem, address it right now that it is starting again, seek professional help, you deserve to be and feel good! Please take care!
